about_the_game:
Unlock the Perplexplore Island Skin available on Fire Oasis. Alongside the cosmetic makeover to Fire Oasis, you'll receive the following permanent boosts to Fire Oasis upon purchasing.
  • 10% speed up to Breeding
  • 10% speed up to Baking

Once an Island Skin has been bought, its Boosts are automatically added to that Island. The Skin does not need to be activated to use the Boosts.

Note: You will need to exit and reopen your game for the Island Skin to appear in your inventory.
